channel.title: Yell Problem

item.title: Yell Problem
item.dc:creator: @Natey Natey
item.description:
@Natey wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”][code]if (command.startsWith(“yell”) && command.length() > 5 && playerRights >= 0 && !muted) {
String titles = “”;

            if (playerRights == 1) {
                titles = "[Moderator] ";
            }
            if (playerRights == 2) {
                titles = "[Admin] ";
            }
            if (playerRights == 3) {
                titles = "[Owner] ";
            }
            if (playerRights == 4) {
                titles = "[Player] ";
            }
            if (playerRights == 0 && donator == 1) {
                titles = "[Donator] ";
            }
            if (playerRights == 0 && donator == 0) {
                titles = "[Player] ";
            }
                            talk(titles + "" + playerName + ": "
                    + command.substring(5));

} else {
sM(“You are muted and cannot talk!”);
}
}
} [/code][/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: Yell Problem
item.dc:creator: @Maximum_ZxZ Maximum ZxZ
item.description:
@Maximum_ZxZ wrote:

Here’s my yell code:

[code]
if (command.startsWith(“yell”) && command.length() > 5 && playerRights >= 0) {
String titles = “”;

            if (playerRights == 1) {
                titles = "[Moderator] ";
            }
            if (playerRights == 2) {
                titles = "[Admin] ";
            }
            if (playerRights == 3) {
                titles = "[Owner] ";
            }
            if (playerRights == 4) {
                titles = "[Player] ";
            }
            if (playerRights == 0 && donator == 1) {
                titles = "[Donator] ";
            }
	if (playerRights == 0 && donator == 0) {
                titles = "[Player] ";
            }                
            talk(titles + "" + playerName + ": "
                    + command.substring(5));

if(muted){
sM(“You are muted and cannot talk!”);
}
} [/code]

But when someone is muted, he can still talk on yell.

How can I fix this ?

Thanks.

Read full topic
